title: 13th & Ellsworth 1 BR patio Apt.
description:

title: Logan Square 1BR/BA 6-mo lease, river view
description:
Looking for someone to transfer the lease of our apartment in Edgewater - 23rd and Race St, right on the Schuylkill River. Unit is on the top (12th floor) of the building, with a beautiful unobstructed south facing view of the river. Building website: https://edgewaterapthomes.com/
The apartment is a 796 sq. ft 1 bed/1 bath. Floor plan details here: https://edgewaterapthomes.com/assets/files/D12.pdf   (note: there is no balcony on this unit despite it being on the floor plan).
The current rent is $2,375/month and this will be the base for any renewal increase once the lease is transferred. Rent is locked-in through April 29, 2023. This is not a sublet–the lease will be transferred to you for the 6-month term noted (10/16/22-4/29/23).
Unit/building notes: The unit has panel flooring, new washer and windows installed this year, recently re-caulked bathtub. Neighbors are only on one side of the unit. Doorman building with amenities such a private dog park, private fenced in courtyard with gas grills, gym, business center and new construction with pool to be ready by Spring 2023. 2 locked bike rooms within attached parking garage. Option for residents to purchase parking in attached or detached parking garage. Parking is not included in rent pricing. Access to Schuylkill River Trail steps from the building.
Reach out ASAP if interested–can provide more photos of unit!

title: Spacious 2 bedroom and 2bath modern home. Updated with polished
description:
show contact info
Walk into the foyer, with unique tile embellishments, and breathtaking ocean views from every window. The spacious chef's kitchen is equipped with a Subzero fridge, Viking cooktop with an industrial hood, Miele coffee machine and food warmer, dishwasher, and a large beverage fridge. The newly installed quartz counters provide an abundance of counter space, and a peninsula island perfectly situated for a breakfast bar. The open layout of the home creates a flow from the dining room, to the living room, which includes a bar with a hidden utility sink, and a large wine cellar. Two bedrooms are located at the main level, both with direct access to the backyard, one of which includes an en-suite bathroom. Upstairs you'll find 2 bedrooms with direct access to the backyard and luscious greenery, with a hall bath in-between. The primary suite provides maximum luxury, with a large balcony to enjoy the ocean views and sea breeze. The ensuite bathroom includes a custom stone slab tub enclosure with jets, a separate shower, and double vanity with a beverage fridge. Separate his and her closets with built-ins, adorned with stained glass and skylights

description:
Newly constructed spacious house for rent! Special attention has been given to each and every detail in the building of this state-of-the-art home. Located in the Grays Ferry section of South Philadelphia, in close proximity to University of Pennsylvania, High way I-76 and the retail corridor, this home is surrounded by numerous new constructions and recent rehab projects.
This gorgeous home has 3 bedrooms with 3 custom bathrooms. The home boasts hardwood flooring, recessed lighting, smoke/carbon monoxide detectors, fire-sprinkler system, and is also cable ready. Enter the home to be greeted by a well-lit and spacious grand living room. Past the sun-lit grand living room you will find your state-of-the-art open galley kitchen. The beautifully appointed kitchen is outfitted with soft-close cabinets, modern Quartz counter-tops, contemporary backsplash, deep sink with chef's faucet, SS Samsung appliance package (dishwasher, fridge, range, microwave), and under cabinet lighting. Here the home presents a large room with a spacious organized closet, a huge bathroom with a custom vanity set, and laundry room. Following the staircase to the 3rd level, you enter to your own private oasis. The 3rd floor has another large bedroom, custom spa-like bathroom, and a spacious closet! The master bath boasts custom tile-work, dual vanity set, soaking tub and a designer rainfall shower. Take another step up the stairs to the pilot-house where you will find the access to your private dual rooftop decks. title: Welcome to the Aria Condominium
description:
Welcome to the Aria Condominium, conveniently situated at the crossroads of Rittenhouse Square and the Avenue of the Arts. This Edmund Gilchrist skyscraper was built in 1929 and is considered to be one of the finest examples of Beaux-Arts architecture in Philadelphia. Converted to condominiums in 2008, each residence features high-end finishes including wood flooring of varying shades; a gourmet kitchen with wood cabinetry, tile backsplash, granite countertops, and breakfast bar, GE Profile stainless steel appliances including a gas range; Kohler bathroom fixtures, and in-residence Bosch front-loading washer and dryer. Residents enjoy a 24-hour doorman and concierge; state-of-the-art fitness center with yoga studio; owner"s lounge and clubroom with a flat-screen TV, DVD, surround sound, pool table, executive board room, and caterer's kitchen; guest suite; business center and library and a bike room in the basement. This is a pet-friendly building with a pet spa and dog run. Multiple, reasonably-priced monthly parking options are available nearby. Convenient to Philadelphia's cultural epicenter, gourmet dining, world-class shopping, and all major transportation lines/hubs.
Pets Allowed
Washer Dryer in unit

title: Rarely offered 1 bed apartment
description:
Rarely offered 1 bed apartment with laundry in-unit at 767 South Front. A beautifully renovated historic rowhouse conveniently located near Philadelphia's most popular historic landmarks, including Penn's Landing, Independence Hall, Elfreth's Alley, the Betsy Ross House, and many more. Availability is limited. The Washington Square neighborhood surrounds Washington Square Park, which served many purposes in the 1800s and was reconstructed in the mid-20th century to better reflect William Penn's vision. Shops, museums, and celebrated restaurants fill the blocks of Washington Square, providing a vibrant social life for its residents. Pictures are of a similar unit in the building.

This large and unique 1-bedroom apartment features original architectural details including crown molding, original woodwork, built-in shelving, and a hand-tiled mosaic fireplace. Tall ceilings, plenty of closets/storage, and a comfortable living space with an open kitchen and in-unit washer/dryer make this apartment the ideal combination of historic charm and modern living. Located very close to Rittenhouse Square, with plenty of restaurants and shopping, grocery and convenience stores, and public transportation all within a few blocks! The building is clean and quiet, and property management is responsive and helpful.
Pets Allowed
washer dryer in unit

title: Enjoy the rest of summer in this
description:
Enjoy the rest of summer in this Philadelphia Chapter Landmark Property originally designed in 1951! Enter through the spacious remodeled lobby where you are greeted by a 24 hour front desk attendant. The property features a fitness center on the lower level along with common areas where you can relax and watch TV or catch up with friends with a game of pool. There's also a place to store your bike in the designated bike room. Looking for outdoor space? There's a roof deck that offers panoramic views of the city! The views are simply breathtaking! This large north facing one bedroom has beautiful hardwood parquet floors and a view you will LOVE! The living area and bedrooms are spacious and have tons of closet space. Monthly rent includes cooking gas, and hot and cold water! SUPER Pet Friendly!! Come see what all the buzz is about at The Parkway House and everything that living in the Art Museum area has to offer!! ***Pictures featured are of the new model unit.***
Pets Allowed
Main floor laundry
2201 Pennsylvania Ave #218

title: MOVE-IN SPECIAL! Luxury 3BD/3Bath New Construction House!
description:
Newly constructed spacious house for rent! Special attention has been given to each and every detail in the building of this state-of-the-art home. Located in the Grays Ferry section of South Philadelphia, in close proximity to University of Pennsylvania, High way I-76 and the retail corridor, this home is surrounded by numerous new constructions and recent rehab projects.
This gorgeous home has 3 bedrooms with 3 custom bathrooms. The home boasts hardwood flooring, recessed lighting, smoke/carbon monoxide detectors, fire-sprinkler system, and is also cable ready. Enter the home to be greeted by a well-lit and spacious grand living room. Past the sun-lit grand living room you will find your state-of-the-art open galley kitchen. The beautifully appointed kitchen is outfitted with soft-close cabinets, modern Quartz counter-tops, contemporary backsplash, deep sink with chef's faucet, SS Samsung appliance package (dishwasher, fridge, range, microwave), and under cabinet lighting. From the kitchen via you will find the entrance to your private backyard. From the first floor, commercial grade Pine staircases (secured by custom railing) lead you up to the 2nd level of the house. Here the home presents a large room with a spacious organized closet, a huge bathroom with a custom vanity set, and laundry room. Following the staircase to the 3rd level, you enter to your own private oasis. The 3rd floor has another large bedroom, custom spa-like bathroom, and a spacious closet! The master bath boasts custom tile-work, dual vanity set, soaking tub and a designer rainfall shower. Take another step up the stairs to the pilot-house where you will find the access to your private dual rooftop decks. The home has electric and water lines on the rooftop, making it an ideal area to host parties and get-togethers. The finished basement offers another spacious bedroom or home office, custom full bathroom, and utility closet.
Extra included bonuses: Large High Energy Efficient windows, Built-in (Bluetooth enabled) speakers in living room & master bedroom, energy efficient DUAL zoned HVAC, organized closet shelving system, Nest camera in front and rear of home, Schlage keyless door lock in front, LED recessed lighting, digital thermostats, and much more! MUST SEE! Home has approximately 1850 SqFt of living space. Located close to public transportation, highway, nightlife, grocery stores, and restaurants. Ask us about our Move-In special for August 2022!

The finished basement offers another spacious bedroom or home office, custom full bathroom, and utility closet.

Step up to the inviting covered front porch and step inside to the open living room. Down the hall, the full bathroom shines with marble floors, new vanity sink, linen closet and tiled tub/shower combination. A hallway linen closet completes the second level. title: MOVE-IN SPECIAL! Luxury3BD/3Bath New Construction House!
description:
Newly constructed spacious house for rent! Special attention has been given to each and every detail in the building of this state-of-the-art home. Located in the Grays Ferry section of South Philadelphia, in close proximity to University of Pennsylvania, High way I-76 and the retail corridor, this home is surrounded by numerous new constructions and recent rehab projects.
This gorgeous home has 3 bedrooms with 3 custom bathrooms. The home boasts hardwood flooring, recessed lighting, smoke/carbon monoxide detectors, fire-sprinkler system, and is also cable ready. Enter the home to be greeted by a well-lit and spacious grand living room. Past the sun-lit grand living room you will find your state-of-the-art open galley kitchen. The beautifully appointed kitchen is outfitted with soft-close cabinets, modern Quartz counter-tops, contemporary backsplash, deep sink with chef's faucet, SS Samsung appliance package (dishwasher, fridge, range, microwave), and under cabinet lighting. From the kitchen via you will find the entrance to your private backyard. From the first floor, commercial grade Pine staircases (secured by custom railing) lead you up to the 2nd level of the house. Here the home presents a large room with a spacious organized closet, a huge bathroom with a custom vanity set, and laundry room. Following the staircase to the 3rd level, you enter to your own private oasis. The 3rd floor has another large bedroom, custom spa-like bathroom, and a spacious closet! The master bath boasts custom tile-work, dual vanity set, soaking tub and a designer rainfall shower. Take another step up the stairs to the pilot-house where you will find the access to your private dual rooftop decks. The home has electric and water lines on the rooftop, making it an ideal area to host parties and get-togethers. The finished basement offers another spacious bedroom or home office, custom full bathroom, and utility closet.
Extra included bonuses: Large High Energy Efficient windows, Built-in (Bluetooth enabled) speakers in living room & master bedroom, energy efficient DUAL zoned HVAC, organized closet shelving system, Nest camera in front and rear of home, Schlage keyless door lock in front, LED recessed lighting, digital thermostats, and much more! MUST SEE! Home has approximately 1850 SqFt of living space. Located close to public transportation, highway, nightlife, grocery stores, and restaurants. Ask us about our Move-In special for August 2022!
